name: Noisy Navy Facebook by hkr
description:
More user styles by me: http://userstyles.dreamflame.in/
--------
Firefox v16+ recommended!
--------
(09.08.2014) New noisy navy wood tiles background (check screenshot)
Redid this from scratch. All bug reports are welcome!
Mind this is still a work in progress and probably will always be as facebook is changing layouts constantly.
Please don't forget to rate/review and don't hesitate to report bugs or ask a question!
additional_info:
More user styles by me: http://userstyles.dreamflame.in/
--------
SPECIAL THANKS TO Azetinho for helping me fix the chat status icons for all non-english locales and the older version of the blueBar
